price: Allah is the One Who made the livestock for you, so that you may ride some and eat others,
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ لِتَرۡكَبُواْ مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
